overview_of_class: The cycling of biogenic elements (C, N, S, Fe, Mn) in surficial environments is the focus of this course. Emphasis will be placed on microbial processes and isotopic signatures.
name: Biogeochemistry
title: WCAS EARTH 317-0-01 Biogeochemistry

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The cycling of biogenic elements (C, N, S, Fe, Mn) in surficial environments is the focus of this course. Emphasis will be placed on microbial processes and isotopic signatures.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: 1 quarter of chemistry plus 1 quarter of geoscience, environmental science, or biology. Taught with CIV ENV 317; students may not earn credit for both courses.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Lecture and discussion, problem sets and a final paper and presentation.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value:
Biogeochemistry: An Analysis of Global Change, 3rd Edition; Schlesinger and Bernhardt
ISBN-10: 0123858747 | ISBN-13: 978-0123858740

subject: EARTH
